          Gain 1 Die per Wound on this character (to maximum of 3).
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Fatal Flaw
upgrades.definition:
This spell can only target enemies with a Debuff. After the attack, remove a Debuff from the target.
          1 success: This character gains 1 Mana
2 successes: 1 Wound and this character gains 2 Mana
3 successes: 1 Wound and this character gains 3 Mana

upgrades.name: Skull Weapon
upgrades.definition:
If an attack with this weapon results in 2 or more Successes, pass this character's Debuff to the target.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds
5 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Tyrantisaurus Blaster
upgrades.definition:
This weapon cannot use a Focus and its scope cannot be modified. Gain +1 Die for every 5" between Tyrantisaurus and the target.
          1 success: 1 Wound
          3 successes: 1 Wound and a Blind debuff
          4 successes: 2 Wounds and a Blind debuff

upgrades.name: Tyrantisaurus Tail
upgrades.definition:
This weapon affects all characters engaged with a Tyrantisaurus.
          -1 Die for every engaged character (to a maximum of 3).
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds and push target 2 hexes

upgrades.name: Short Axe
upgrades.definition:
Attacks with this weapon cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 1).
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 1 Wound and 1 Wound (if this attack had a Focus).

upgrades.name: Laser Gun (Human)
upgrades.definition:
If Man-E-Faces gains a Robot Face, replace this weapon with Laser Gun (Robot).
          If Man-E-Faces gains a Monster Face, replace this weapon with Laser Gun (Monster).
          1 success: 1 Wound
2 successes: 2 Wounds and Man-E-Faces gains a Protection Buff.

upgrades.name: Laser Gun (Robot)
upgrades.definition:
At the end of the round, replace this weapon with Laser Gun (Human).
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Laser Gun (Monster)
upgrades.definition:
At the end of the round, replace this weapon with Laser Gun (Human).
          This weapon can be used as a melee weapon.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Long Axe
upgrades.definition:
At the end of the activation, if this character has a Focus, gain a Protection Buff.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds
5 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Rebel Pistol
upgrades.definition:
This does not use a ranged weapon slot.
          During Interruptions, if this character isn't engaged, this weapon can target any enemy, not only the one interrupted.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 1 Wound and this character gains a Focus.

upgrades.name: Power of Friendship
upgrades.definition:
Targets allies instead of enemies. The target does not make a defense test.
          Attacks with this spell cost 1 AP less (to minimum of 1).
          2 successes: This character and the target gain an Enhancement Buff.

upgrades.name: Swiftness
upgrades.definition:
Targets allies instead of enemies. The target does not make a defense test.
          Attacks with this spell cost 1 AP less (to minimum of 1).
          2 successes: Quickness Buff.
4 successes: Quickness Buff and a Focus

upgrades.name: Club
upgrades.definition:
Gain +1 Die for every activated enemy.
          1 success: 1 Wound
          2 successes: 2 Wounds
          4 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Dragon Blaster
upgrades.definition:
This weapon affects the target and all characters that are both within 3 hexes from the target and within the target's rear arc.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 1 Wound and 1 Wound (only additional target)
4 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Strong will Fall
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking, if the target has a Buff, gain +2 Dice and remove a Buff from the target.
          1 success: 1 Wound
4 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Tornado
upgrades.definition:
This spell can target any character, if doesn't affect them, but it does affect other characters within 4 hexes. Pulls caused by this spell are made between main and additional targets.
          1 success: Pull target 1 hex
2 successes: 1 Wound and pull target 2 hexes
3 successes: 1 Wound and pull target 3 hexes

upgrades.name: Metal Fist
upgrades.definition:
Attacks with this weapon made immediately after a move action cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 0). Pushes made with this weapon trigger allies' overwatches.
          1 success: Push target 1 hex
          2 successes: 1 Wound and push target 2 hexes
          3 successes: 2 Wound and pull target 3 hexes

upgrades.name: Halberd
upgrades.definition:
For every '6' rolled in the attack test, the target loses 1 defence Die. The number of defence Dice  cannot be reduced by 2.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds
5 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Magic Wand
upgrades.definition:
This does not use a ranged weapon slot.
          Before attacking, spend up to 3 Mana to gain 1 Dice per Mana spent. The target tests Mind instead of Toughness.
          1 success: Perform a free Spell Attack on the same target
          2  success: Perform a free Spell Attack on the same target at no Mana cost

upgrades.name: Black Blaster
upgrades.definition:
Attacks with this weapon are treated as skill tests and attack tests.
          1 success: 1 Wound
4 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Motivational Speech
upgrades.definition:
This spell does not use a spell slot, does not require a target, and tests Strength instead of Power. Do not make a defence test.
          1 success: The next ally activated this round gains 1 AP

upgrades.name: Chain Lightning
upgrades.definition:
If at least one '6' is rolled in this attack, perform a free attack with this spell on another enemy within 6" from the target. This attack uses 2 Dice fewer than the previous one.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Insults
upgrades.definition:
This spell can target any character.
          Attacks with this spell cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 0).
          1 success: A Curse Debuff and an Enhancement Debuff.
          3 successes: Enhancement Debuff

upgrades.name: Hand of Fate
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking, add up to 3 Dice. All successes are cancelled if at least one '1' is rolled in the attack test.
          2 successes: 1 Wound
4 successes: 2 Wounds
6 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Multi-Cannon
upgrades.definition:
Choose up to 3 different targets and attack them one by one. Suffer -1 Die for every chosen target.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Knife of Evil
upgrades.definition:
Attacks with this weapon are always treated as flank attacks, but do not receive a bonus to the scope unless they are really made from a flank.
          1 success: 1 Wound
          2 successes: 1 Wound and change the target's facing
          3 successes: 2 Wounds and change the target's facing

upgrades.name: Cursed Sword
upgrades.definition:
If an attack with this weapon results in 2 or less Successes, this character gains a Curse Debuff.
          1 success: 1 Wound
2 successes: 2 Wounds
5 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Power Blaster
upgrades.definition:
If an attack with this weapon results in 2 or more Successes, Webstor can perform a free 2-hex move action.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 1 Wound and a Curse debuff (if flank attack)
5 successes: 2 Wounds and a Curse debuff (if flank attack)

skills.name: I Have the Power!
skills.definition: During any test, He-Man may reroll 1 extra (die) for each (mana token) spent on rerolls.

skills.name: Superhuman Reflex
skills.definition: He-Man cannot receive (mana token) from fate and glory cards. If he gains a (focus token), he also gainst 1 (mana token).

skills.name: Shared Power
skills.definition: Any Ally within 8" can spend Evil-Lyn's mana as their own.

skills.name: Dark Presence
skills.definition:
Test (power) against the (mind) of an enemy within 16".
            1 (success): (blind debuff token).

skills.name: Summon
skills.definition:
Test (power) -2.
            1 (success): Choose an ally within 12". and teleport the ally to a hex adjacent to Skeletor.

skills.name: Lord of Destruction
skills.definition: Until the end of the current activation or interruption, Skeletor can use (spell) while engaged.

skills.name: Always Vigilant
skills.definition: At the end of the activation, if there are no enemies within 8", gain an (overwatch token).

skills.name: Master Tactician
skills.definition:
Test (power) +1.
            1 (success): The next ally activated this round gains 2 (mana token).
            This ability cannot be used during an interruption.

skills.name: To the Sky!
skills.definition: If Stratos isnt' engaged, spend up to 5 (mana token) to jump 1 hex for every (mana token) spent.

skills.name: Leader of Avion
skills.definition:
Test (power). 1 (success): Choose any activated ally (line of sight not required).
            This ally gains a (focus token) or an (overwatch token).
            This ability cannot be used during an interruption.

skills.name: Magic Hat
skills.definition:
Orko starts the game with 3 (mana token).
            Before Orko or ally within 8" makes a defence test, Orko may spend up to 3 (mana token) and add to this test 1 extra (die) per (mana token) spent.

skills.name: Traveller from Trolla
skills.definition:
After spending (mana token) and (action) for (spell), but before making an attack test, Orko has to make a (mind) +1 test.
            If he does not roll at least 2 (success), his spell has no effect.

skills.name: Ramming Speed
skills.definition:
Ram Man makes a free move action with his (speed) value +2 (to a maximum of 6). Test (strenth) against (toughness) of each enemy within 2 hexes.
            1 (success): (Knockdown debuff token)

skills.name: Human Battering Ram
skills.definition: If Ram Man ends his activation engaged, he gains a (focus token).

skills.name: Instant Puddle
skills.definition:
Test (power).
            1 (success): Place a (Mer-Man mark token) within 8". The area within 2 hexes from a (Mer-Man mark token) is treated as difficult terrain.

skills.name: Freezing Ray
skills.definition:
Test (power) +1 against the (mind) of an enemy within 12".
            1 (success): (cripple debuff token).

skills.name: Gammavision
skills.definition:
Test (power) +2 against the (mind) of an enemy within 12".
            1 (success): (Tri-Klops mark token), all attacks against a character with a (Tri-Klops mark token) gain a (focus token).

skills.name: Optic Blast!
skills.definition:
If an enemy within 8" receives a (Debuff token), Tri-Klops can spend 1 to 3 (mana token) and test (power) (+1 Die per (mana token) spent) against the (mind) of this enemy.
            1 (success): 1 (wound token).

skills.name: Weapon Swap
skills.definition:
If Trap Jaw has the 'Hook Attachment' equipped, replace it with the 'Laser Attachment'.
            If Trap Jaw has the 'Laser Attachment' equipped, replace it with the 'Hook Attachment'.

skills.name: Grappling Hook
skills.definition:
If Trap Jaw has the 'Hook Attachment' equipped, test (perception) -1.
            Trap Jaw can jump in a straigth line up to 2 hexes per (success).

skills.name: Acrobatic
skills.definition:
Once per her interruption Teela can perform a free 2 hex move action.
            This action can be made in any direction and cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Warrior Goddess
skills.definition: Allies within 8" can reroll up to 2 (Dice) during their skill tests.

skills.name: Vision of the Future
skills.definition:
Test (Power).
            For every Success look at a top fate card, then place them back on the top of a fate deck in any order.

skills.name: Telepathic Guide
skills.definition:
This ability can only be used during an interruption. Choose an ally within 12" and test (Power) -1.
            2 Successes: The ally interrupts the same enemy.

skills.name: Eye of the Bee
skills.definition: All tests with a Focus, gain +1 Die.

skills.name: Hero in the Sky
skills.definition: Each time an ally gets a Focus, Buzz-Off can immediately jump 1 hex. This movement cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Face of the Robot
skills.definition: Gain (Robot Face) and a Focus.  (Robot Face) provides Man-E-Faces with +2 (Perception) and -1 (Toughness).

skills.name: Face of the Monster
skills.definition:
Gain (Monster Face).  (Monster Face) provides Man-E-Faces with +2 (Strength) and -1 (Mind). Test (Strength) -1 against the (Toughness) of an enemy engaged with Man-E-Faces.
            1 (Success): 1 Wound

skills.name: Lone Warrior
skills.definition: At the end of the activation, if there are no other characters within 6", gain an Overwatch.

skills.name: Eager to Punch
skills.definition: The Melee attack made immediately after a move action gain +2 Dice.

skills.name: Heroic Guard
skills.definition: Whenever an ally on an adjacent hex is about to be attacked, if that attack can target the Palace Guard, you may redirect it to him.

skills.name: Endless Heroes
skills.definition: There can be up to 2 Palace Guards in a single force.

skills.name: Lead by Example
skills.definition: Any ally within 12" can use this skill as their own. He-Man interrupts this ally's activation or interruption. During this interruption He-Man can move in any direction.

skills.name: Tiger's Claw
skills.definition:
Test (Strength) -1 against the (Mind) of an enemy engaged with He-Man.
            1 (Success): 1 Wound.
            2 (Successes): 1 Wound and a (Knockdown debuff).

skills.name: Nightmare
skills.definition:
Test (Power) +1 against the (Mind) of an ally within 16".
            1 (Success): (Curse Debuff), Scareglow performs a free move action.

skills.name: Fearsome Presence
skills.definition:
If any character ends their activation or interruption within 2 hexes from Scareglow, test (Power) against (Mind) of that character.
            1 (Success): (Curse Debuff).

skills.name: Primal Rage
skills.definition:
Upon activation:
            If Beast man has at least 1 Wound: gain 1 Mana.
            Additionally, if Beast Man has at least 3 Wounds: gain 1 AP.

skills.name: Supernatural Endurance
skills.definition: When receiving at least 2 Wounds, Beast Man may spend 1 Mana, to reduce the number of Wounds received by 1.

skills.name: Cold-Blooded
skills.definition: Whiplash cannot perform a focus action. Each time an ally receives at least 1 (Wound), Whiplash gains a (Focus token).

skills.name: Tail Trashing
skills.definition: Choose a character on an adjacent hex and test (Strength). Target is pushed up to 1 hex per (Success).

skills.name: Evil Master of Odors
skills.definition:
At the end of activation, remove all 'Mana tokens' and test 'Toughness' against 'Mind' of all other characters within (+1 per Mana removed) hexes.
            1 (success): (Blind debuff token) or (Knockdown debuff token) or (Cripple debuff token).

skills.name: Stinking Delight
skills.definition: When any character gains a (Debuff), Stinkor gains 1 (Mana token).

skills.name: Master of Escape
skills.definition: Immediately after Webstor receives at least 1 Wound, he can jump up to 4 hexes. This movement cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Hide and Seek
skills.definition: Gain a Webstor Token. When Webstor has a Webstor token, he can only be attacked or interrupted by characters within 6", and his flank attacks gain +2 Dice.

skills.name: Hovering Goon
skills.definition: Move actions performed by Hover Robot use jump rules.

skills.name: Endless Evil
skills.definition: There can be up to 2 Hover Robots in a single force.

skills.name: Deception
skills.definition: During Skeletor's activation or interruption, Skeletor gains 1 Mana for every played fate card.

skills.name: Panthor's Fangs
skills.definition:
Test (Strength) against (Toughness) of an Enemy engaged with Skeletor.
            1 (Success): 1 Wound.
            2 (Successes): 1 Wound and push target 1 hex.
